Tariff.A2: Advance Rental plan of Rs. 749 :- Unlimited All Local + STD calls, unlimited data usage, Speed upto 200Mbps
Tariff.A143: ISD Call Facility is not available
Tariff.A268: Fair Usage Policy apply. Data quota 3333 GB, Speed upto 200 Mbps. In case customer exhausts his GB quota during the bill cycle period, the plan speed will get throttled to 1mbps speed and customer will continue to enjoy the services till the end of bill cycle.
Tariff.A269: 1. The charges are exclusive of applicable taxes. Advance billing module is available in specific cities. 2. Customer needs to pay the amount in advance in order to keep his services active. 3. The advance billing bill cycle will start on the day of activation of the customer. 4. Post expiry of the validity, customer need to recharge for the services to remain active. 5. In case the customer fails to recharge post validity expiry, services will be discontinued. 6. Delay in recharging post 7 days would attract a penalty of Rs. 150/- at the time of subsequent recharge. 7. In case customer exhausts his/her data quota during the bill cycle period, the plan speed will get throttled to1mbps speed and customer will continue to enjoy the services till the end of the bill cycle date. 8. VAS, Premium Rate Services , ISD call facility are not available. 9. Customer will be able to dial toll free nos as they are not chargeable. However dialling of special numbers is not permitted Example (53123) 10. All Advance billing cities will have "Only DSL Services" till POI from BSNL is obtained for the particular City. 11. Activation Fee is Rs. 1000 for monthly plan. However, with Annual Rental Plans for 3/6/12 months the customer gets waiver on activation fee. 12. The CPE and Digital Services may be provided either by Airtel and/or its affiliates / subsidiaries. This Plan shall only be available as a bundled offering along with CPE and Digital services. The customer shall accordingly make a payment of INR 250 towards CPE and Digital Services on monthly rental, separately to Airtel and/or its affiliates / subsidiaries, as the case may be. 13. For 6/12 months, customer is eligible for discount as per below:. 6M ARP Plan - Rental for 6 months would be Rs.4,044. Payments towards CPE and Digital services will be Rs. 1500. 12M ARP Plan - Rental for 12 months would be Rs.7,190. Payments towards CPE and Digital services will be Rs. 3000. 14. Wiring Charges are Rs. 1000/- and it will be applicable to all customers to be paid at the time of installation (collected directly by Vendor) 15. Unlimited plans are for non-commercial usage 16. Subscription to Airtel Xstream app & Zee5. To be subscribed via Airtel Thanks app 17. Subscription to Amazon Prime for 12 months subject to subscriber continuing on the relevant plan. To be subscribed via Airtel Thanks app 18. Unutilized free benefits will be forfeited at the expiry of recharge validity period of the plan. 19. Airtel Xstream DTH box available with a security deposit of rs 1500.
